website_summaries.verdict: This user-friendly and economical device delivers immediate neck pain relief.
pros: Device is fully adjustable for added convenience
Helps reduce pain associated with a pinched nerve, herniated disc or other neck and shoulder problems
Folding design ensures you should have no trouble carrying the device with you as needed
Fits perfectly inside a backpack or purse
cons: Inferior quality in comparison to other neck traction devices

customer_reviews.title: Material isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Product inflates as advertised, but it doesn't feel like it's giving proper traction in my neck. It's very uncomfortable, not only because it feels like someone with giant inflatable hands softly strangling me, but because the material itself is itchy and hot. I can't even wear the thing for more than five minutes at a time because it's oppressively hot, and I have to put some other material, like tissues or a towel or something, between the device and my skin so it doesn't drive me crazy with itching. Maybe this kind of product will work for some people, but it just wasn't for me. I'd really suggest finding a softer and cooler material to wrap it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Webb

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good quality for the price. I have Ehlers-Danlos hyper-mobile type and my cervical vertebrae are degenerating. Some days I'm in so much pain and using this for about 20 minutes really gives relief. Only concern might b that it can get a little warm sometimes but actually, the heat even helps. The device itself doesn't generate heat but holds your body's heat in, making you feel warm. The real purpose of course, is to decompress and relieve pain in the joint spaces of the neck and it does that very well.
customer_reviews.author: bikin fool

customer_reviews.title: Too Small and Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews looked favorable, but must have all been from petite people. I have a 17 inch neck. The front closure straps are too short, so they cut into my neck. I tried extending them with some velcro straps I had, but I ended up wedging a piece of soft foam between the straps and my neck to cushion them better. Once inflated, it feels uncomfortable as it puffs up a lot in the rear, but not much up front. The little "ball valve" is not convenient as the ball is loose in the tube can travel away from its little recess pocket lobe up and down the tube. I am returning this item, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: isn't comfortable, and needs to be fitted a specific way
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a huge fan of this product. In fact, I was planning on returning it but got busy and never did. While it does what it is supposed to for the most part, in order to get the traction needed, it really squishes your face/chin area, isn't comfortable, and needs to be fitted a specific way. I do like that you are able to adjust the size using the velcro straps and the build is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for chronic neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: I feel the cervical neck traction device is helpful with my chronic neck pain. It is lightweight and compact, I was even able to fit it in my suitcase when traveling. The only dislike I have is when pumping it up I hve to count each pump since there is no pressure gauge and you want to increase the pressure over time. Other than that I find it really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my jaw.
customer_reviews.text: This device caused me to have pain in my jaw. I wore it several times in the one week period I had it, with the same results each time. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Woodiwiss

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper then going to the doctor!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple device that I actually can feel working. After you Velcro the 2 straps down inflate the pillow similar to a blood pressure cuff and feel the stretch. You might have to play with the tightness of the Velcro straps as it can seem to slightly "choke" you. Once you find what works best for you it can be worn as long as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use but I think it helps.
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty awkward device. I wish it came with instructions on how best to place it and recommendations for how to use the Velcro straps most effectively. I try to wear it for 15 min at a time...but due to it’s necessary tightness...I’m aware of my breathing. I find that if I inflate it and lean forward or even head down for a short while, I feel the traction better.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Swipe left
customer_reviews.text: I had severe neck injurys and following pain. I've tried everything to easy the muscle trauma and this Broke on the third use and did very little in the way of traction. Disappointed. I am now using the Shiatsu neck massager and it has been amazing. Skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: william david schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I guess if ya only need to use it for a week then it’s a good buy, unfortunately I need one that will last ...
customer_reviews.text: This device was really helping my pinched nerve in my neck for about a week and a half and now it’s leaking air so now I’m back to order another one but I will not be ordering this one again. I guess if ya only need to use it for a week then it’s a good buy, unfortunately I need one that will last a little more than that. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Provides structural support. Recovered from a broken neck (C5 & C6) which needs to have gravity pressure released from pinching nerves that affect arms and hands. This reasonably priced device works well at releasing pressure on the nerves in the neck. Requires getting used to but by self adjusting it, increasing and decreasing pressure, it performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: Use with some caution but AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This really works! Can feel a bit like being choked but worth it. Don’t get carried away, you can over stretch if you have issues. Use with some caution but holy cow... nothing like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzario

customer_reviews.title: excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 herniated discs on my neck ,my physical therapist recomended it, is great, relief the pain and stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but durability?
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It helped relieve pain from a pinched nerve in my neck and shoulder knots. Durability is a question as this is the second unit I've purchased. The first had a small leak. Hopefully this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully For My Bulging Neck Disks, C3&4
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, you can feel it stretching and relaxing your neck. I have bulging C3&4, and this really helps relieve some of my pain. Check with your doctor first, of course. Mine recommended neck traction, and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It works very well to release the stress in the neck
customer_reviews.text: My acupuncturist recommended I get a traction device. This one was not very expensive and it does the job quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzie

customer_reviews.title: Helps Sore Neck
customer_reviews.text: This Neck Traction Device is easy to use and is effective in relieving my neck pain. I wear it while watching TV. I wear it 10 minutes---twice a day---to start. Follow the directions which are included. Very easy to inflate using your own breath---NO complicated inflation instructions with this product. Lightweight and comfortable. I bought another one for my friend who has neck pain. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ljattia

customer_reviews.title: Oh what a relief it is
customer_reviews.text: I have relief I have not had in a while...I cannot thank you enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really works for relief my neck shoulder pain!
customer_reviews.text: It's really works for relief my neck shoulder pain, comfortable! Save money!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought thisbproduct for my grandmother who has a problem with pinched nerves in her upper back and neck. She loves it and it’s super easy for her to use. It smells like plastic at first but after a day or so that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Peffley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought different stuff for my neck so far this is the best one. So far I would love to give a 5 star, because I went to see my doctor and she said it is definitely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JPACK

customer_reviews.title: Works for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: It works to relieve pressure on my neck for a little while. When the device is inflated it tends to scrunch up on my neck too high and gets up around my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Phx Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. . .
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great therapeutic device. Exactly what was needed and affordable on a very tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: Great and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. It arrived quickly and does what it says. My husband uses it with ease and he couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: The velcro straps could be a bit more comfortable, but overall I like it
customer_reviews.text: The velcro straps could be a bit more comfortable, but overall I like it. Provides the neck relief I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller Roby

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain, back & neck issues. Using this product about 10-15 minutes every night has helped relieve some of the tension in my neck. Wearing this & a nice hot foot bath is what I look forward to at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Broughton

customer_reviews.title: and is pretty well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works, and is pretty well made for the price. Be careful with it though, as it can be over inflated quite easily. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Chooch

customer_reviews.title: This item was FDA approved the other was not.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a similar product that when inflated pushed inward against the neck,not good. This product pushes upward decompressing the spine in the neck and not inward against the neck cutting off blood flow when heavily inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Godwin

customer_reviews.title: too big for neck
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was too large for the circumference of my neck (which is 13"). I didn't see much difference in pain when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: VCEC shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as intended. It did nothing to relieve my neck pain and I’ve had cervical traction before. Only used it once and feel like this is a waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, service & price. Have used these for over 20 years for cervical spine issues.Orthopedic Doctor recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Didn't notice anything while using it but the next day i could feel the kink in my neck had alleviated.

customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and works well. Takes away pain from a pinched nerve in my neck/shoulder area. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to relieve my cervical spine and the pain going down my arm. I don't use it often. Only when necessary.

customer_reviews.text: I am amazed how well this product works especially for the price.

customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - sent it back. Has a hole or something wrong with it. Air escapes

customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it it was uncomfortable and took to long to pump up

customer_reviews.title: How consistent use as described in pamphlet works really good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use, easy to get off and on. helps if you use it on a regular basis.

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was great...then it began leaking and would no longer hold air. I ordered a second one and it was also great...for a month and 2 days. It works very well, just not for very long.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works good, may be a little uncomfortable but if it does what its supposed to it stands to reason it might be uncomfortable.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cervical collar has helped my, well made and useful.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, my neck felt stretched out after use

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Provides relief and is simple to use. I've used other traction devices and this is the most comfortable!

customer_reviews.text: It was used to give support and relief to the neck and head of my husband who is recovering from a stroke.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Helps to alleviate my neck pain and nerve pain in my arm. Prescribed by my physical therapist. Very nicely made and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Only draw back is if over pumped it seemed cause ...
customer_reviews.text: Only draw back is if over pumped it seemed cause a lot of pressure as far as blood flow in neck and gave me a dizzy felling. Don't over pressurize...

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product for just over a month and it is now leaking. Unfortunately now I have to purchase a new one.

customer_reviews.title: I have neck pain regularly and headaches. Neck traction pillow gives me more ch relief!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I like that you can pump it up to desired position for neck comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Great for stretching out my neck, has reduced my tension headaches

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Seller is responsive and awesome. Changed my life.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to be helping, but really too early to tell
customer_reviews.author: Alice Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and it works as advertised. Velour type covering is comfortable, fits my size 16 neck just fine.Inflator pump appears to be good quality(similar to blood pressure cuff pump).
customer_reviews.author: Debi Gick

customer_reviews.title: somewhat uncomfortable for my short neck
customer_reviews.text: My neck is short and this is for a long-necked person. I use it though.
customer_reviews.author: JCandTFinSJ

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, however did not work .
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked one time and that was it , has not worked since. I was pleased with this item , I just wish it would have continued to work.
customer_reviews.author: interested

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Device appears well made. It has 3 layers to inflate and takes awhile to pump it up to full extension. I have a long neck, and therefore this 3 layer device extends high enough to give me the traction and relief I need. I gave my 2 layer device to my mother and replaced mine with this one. For me, these traction devices give me as much or more relief from cervical neck pain than a trip to the chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: jluczky

customer_reviews.title: Did not ease my neck pain
customer_reviews.text: While this product definitely stretches out the neck if pumped up at full capacity, I do not recommend doing so. It did nothing to help with my neck pain. That being said, perhaps nothing would be helpful as I do have degenerative disks in my neck. This was not for me, and I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: HMCN7604

customer_reviews.title: Works great, relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: I have had a tight neck that gets tighter, I use this at a pretty high pressure, blown way up, for 10-15 minutes, even 20-30 and when I take it off I feel so much decompression. I walk around the house with it at less pressure and feel my posture and head position much better. Daily use hasn't fixed any huge problem but it does provide hours of more comfort. Hoping use over time will maybe permanently help some issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I work at my desk 10-12 hours a day SELDOM getting up, I'm a dispatcher. I have shoulder and neck pain, pinched nerve in the neck. I use this 2-3 times a day sitting at my desk and the relief is fabulous, temporary, but fabulous, and any relief is welcomed! I only use at work because when at home I seldom have pain. I recommend this to ANYONE needing some relief from neck pain!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: good product so far
customer_reviews.text: This my second one of these, and a different brand than the first one which sprang a leak (after 2 years). This one is taller and seems to be better made, so I am hoping there will be no leaks in the future. I use it for my arthritis in my cervical spine, and it really helps: 30 minutes every evening while watching TV and no headache in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Morarre

customer_reviews.title: Feels Strange, but It Works
customer_reviews.text: This device is well made and feels strange when inflating, but once traction is reached it feels great. Really helped my neck heal properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.L. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Useless - Dont Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but very poor in result unless you are size 1 to 4 and less then 5 ft in height. For the average size person in the USA this product is of no benefit. Don't waste your money. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Treasure Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stress
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Cervical Neck Traction I have bought. My other 2 were by another company. A little different. This one is nice because you can inflate the rings you want to relieve your pain. After using it a couple of times inflate all of the rings for most support. Easy to use and the price is right. I will probably be ordering another one for myself. This one was for my 97 yr old mother.
customer_reviews.author: sewcrazy

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is wonderful. Put it on as soon as I received it and all I can say is WOW, felt great especially when you just let the weight of your head rest back into it, I will be using this a lot, I hope it lasts at least 6 months, if it does I will be getting another for myself and probably a couple for other people I know who would benefit from this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs something
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helps but I feel like it comes up to far on my face. I need the most pulling in the back of my neck and it's be nice to have the option to not inflate the whole thing and just the back. A wrap of some sort to keep the front from filling up. That part is uncomfortable to me. Great to push your shoulders out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: K Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neck pain. thought I"d give this a try and it doesn't do anything for me. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife's neck pain. Seems to be working well. Price was good. This decompressor is mobile which allows him to use rather laying down, sitting, or standing! It's comfortable and was affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, how well it works I had to to give it a 5. As suggested I'm using it a couple of times a day for neck, shoulder pain. It is comfortable with a soft cover. I'm happy to say it's working
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It works for neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 bulging discs in my neck. I use this frequently because it doesn't take much for me to have nerve pain in my arm or numbness in my hand. It's comfortable and easy to fill and adjust the amount of extension. I usually start out and after a while pump it up to increase the lift. It's amazing how well it relieves cricks from sleeping wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Doulbd

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by physical therapist.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve in my neck and my physical therapist recommended this device for home use between PT sessions. It works as described and relief my neck pain greatly. I use it for 20 min several times a day and, if I skip wearing it, my condition regresses.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This device does exactly what it says. And it does feel good to use. Especially when I get my headaches. But I have to be careful not to use it too often. My neck is more fragile after using it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The one time I got to use it, it did wonders for my neck. After only one use it stopped inflating. Garbage.

customer_reviews.title: No Traction at all
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible and does not work. Maybe its my small neck but I felt ZERO traction at all.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value and works well. It's not very tough so be careful you don't over-inflate it and burst one of the bladders.

I’m a physical therapist with a herniated disk, and even tho this is inexpensive, it really creates gentle traction and I get pain relief while using it. I will even recommend this to my patients.

customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described and very convenient. Perfect for home or travel use. I've got a 22 inch neck and it fits fine with room to spare. No more sitting in a chair facing a door a couple times a day!

customer_reviews.title: THIS CERVICAL NECK TRACTION DEVICE WORKS AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: I HAVEN'T USED THIS VERY LONG THOUGH IT HELPS TO REDUCE MY NECK PAIN. I HOPE W/ CONTINUED USE IT WILL HELP VERYY MUCH. PRODUCT IS EASY TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: ED FILIPPI

product_meta.title: Cervical Neck Traction Device,Effective and Instant Relief for Chronic Neck & Shoulder & Head Pain, More Effective Tension and Comfortable Without Choking by New Design
feature_bullets: FAST NECK PAIN RELIEF AND SAFETY: Provides Effective traction Relieves neck pain for anyone suffering from neck arthritis, herniated/bulging disc in the neck, neck strains,, and a faster recovery from neck injuries, Using 2-3 sessions per day for 15-25 days you will get longtime relief from stress and pressures of the neck pain, shoulder pain, muscles spasms,without the need for medications or surgery,This product causes no pain and side effects if used in accordance with the instruction given

NEW VERSION WITHOUT CHOKING: On the market , the most of this kind of traction have a design problem that will choking when using, ONTEN try best solved this problem Successfully , when you pump more ,you just get more traction you needed, but without choking ,without ckoking!

IMPROVE BLOOD CIRCULATION : This cervical traction device helps to increase blood circulation to the structures of the cervical spine, helps to oxygenate muscles, nerves, tendons, thus decreasing pain and promoting relaxation.
EASY TO USE AND CARRY: No any assembly needed, It is portable and You can easily treat your pain in the comfort of your home or the office or anywhere you go.
